name: Pursuit of Meaning
description:
A unique game combining 2 opposites:  idle, clicker + action, adventure.

Which will you chose?

  • A stable life.
  • Or danger, but a life of deep purpose.

The game is set in the unforgiving tundra.  You can choose to stay in the confines of your village, collecting wood, getting married and having a family. Or you can risk it all to discover secrets  exist beyond the mountains.
